dmca.title: Google Groups DMCA - Joan Green Designs1
dmca.body:
Faxed to: (650) 963-3255 and entailed to: removals@google.com

October 24, 2006

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

Re: Notice of Copyright Infringements on Google Hosted Group, Dmommas-PC-Mess owned by Peggy James

Dear Sirs,

I am the designated copyright agent for Joan Green and her company, Joan Green Designs. Joan Green has reported the below copyright infringements of her copyrighted materials per the DMCA law and Google's requirements for reporting copyright infringements. According to DMCA laws, you need to remove her copyrighted materials immediately, as she has complied with your reporting process and has provided the information that you need. Please act at once to shut this group down, as more of her copyrighted materials are being posted here daily. Her company is losing money every day that her copyrighted patterns are continuing remain as downloadable files on your Google hosted site. Ms. Green has reported this weeks ago, and we would like to know why the copyright infringements are allowed to continue on this group. Her copyrighted materials listed below are still posted and available for download on this group. I request that you immediately shut down this group due to its blatant disregard of Federal and International Copyright Laws as well as Google's own terms of service. The group owner Peggy James' previous Google group (DmommaJSharesPC) was shut down for the same reason of blatant copyright violations. How much longer will she be permitted to use Google services illegally?

Previously DMCA Complaint Below:

This is to inform you that many of my copyrighted craft booklets appear in their entirety as scanned images posted on your hosted online group "Dmommas PC Mess" at:http://groups.google.com/group/Dmommas-PC-Mess
These illegal copies of my patterns have all been posted by the Group Owner and sole poster to this group, Peggy James, email address, dmommajsharespc@gmail.com

I am the exclusive owner of the copyrights to these following craft booklets and have not granted permission for anyone to post these publicly. On each of these postings, my company, Joan Green Designs, and my name, Joan Green, along with my copyright notice is clearly shown. The copyrighted works at issue are the posted scans of my booklets as follows:

1. Bakery Chef Santa
Message ID: 273ad4a70609010552p18e5a28dk55880033ad3e883c mail.gmail.com
